billings.meetingHighlights: Montana's largest city recovery with meetings throughout metro area; strong oil industry and railroad heritage.
billings.transitInfo: MET Transit buses; Billings Logan International Airport (BIL); I-90 corridor.

missoula.neighborhoods: Downtown Missoula, University District, Rattlesnake, Southgate, Target Range
missoula.meetingHighlights: College-town recovery with University of Montana presence; vibrant young people's meetings; outdoor recovery culture.
missoula.transitInfo: Mountain Line Transit buses; Missoula Montana Airport (MSO); I-90 location.

great-falls.areaDescription: Great Falls area, North Central Montana
great-falls.neighborhoods: Downtown Great Falls, Black Eagle, Malmstrom AFB area
great-falls.meetingHighlights: Military community recovery serving Malmstrom AFB and city; strong service tradition; Electric City meetings.
great-falls.transitInfo: Great Falls Transit District buses; Great Falls International Airport (GTF); US Highway 87.

bozeman.neighborhoods: Downtown Bozeman, MSU campus area, South Bozeman, Four Corners
bozeman.meetingHighlights: College-town and outdoor recreation recovery; Montana State University presence; young people and ski-town meetings.
bozeman.transitInfo: Streamline bus service; Bozeman Yellowstone International Airport (BZN); I-90 access.
